title: Is it possible for colleges to reopen in December 2020 considering the current situation in July 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is possible if everyone does their part to prevent the spread of the pandemic. Social distancing and wearing masks are what is required. It worked in other countries and it can work in the United States. It would also help if we had a president who set an example and who doesn’t see this pandemic as a partisan political issue.

May be as now experts are saying that peak will come in mid september , if will come true then schools might open by december, If this news also became false like peak of corona in end july then can’t say anything. Just wait and watch.
